box.text: Mastercraft Objects Weapons, armor, and some other types of equipment can be constructed as mastercraft objects. The exceptional quality of these objects provides the user a bonus on attack rolls, defense, or some other characteristic that improves when the object is used. A mastercraft object that provides a +1 bonus and can usually be purchased on the open market as a custom version of a common object. The increased cost of this item is 75% of the item's cost.

item.text: Mastercraft objects with a bonus of +2 or +3 are consideredsale. If a grandmastercraft +2 object could be found for purchase, its cost would add 125% to the normal cost. The cost of a grandmastercraft +3 object would add 200% to the normal cost.
